annotations.description: I've been thinking a lot about sustainability in cocktails lately, in fact it has been a huge conversation in the larger bar community in the past couple yea...
annotations.title: A Lesson In Sustainability With The Kitty Highball

textContent:
2oz (60ml) Red Wine
.75oz (22.5ml) Ginger Syrup
.5oz (15ml) Lime Juice
Top Soda Water or Ginger Beer

Shake and strain into highball
Top with soda water or ginger beer

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0HGtsSff7LI
title: Kitty Highball
